phrases: In third place, from Arayada High School: Motoba!
Motoba has just placed third in the Prefectural Tournament!
She is the fastest swimmer in our school!
Okay, both of you take your seats.
You were faster than the third-years!
Sure enough, you have a future as a pro swimmer!
I do not get it, but maybe talking about being a pro swimmer is...
Maybe it is all the pressure.
I placed third in a swimming competition!
It is because you helped hone my skills through Wii Wii Sports!
I wonder if you can use that in real life...
You like the beach and stuff, and now you are a swimmer in The Game of Life, huh?
Maybe you will be a pro swimmer and capture the gold!
I do not get it, but maybe talking about being a pro swimmer is...
Kirie might not like being told stuff like that!
I, um, I am sorry, Master.
Say, was it YOU who wrote this?
I want to... to be a... storybook author!
So, it is a storybook author you have wanted to be.
Hey, can I take a look?
Everyone, are you aware what day it is today?
And March 5th is Girls' Day, when girls dress in traditional Japanese clothing!
I am pretty sure it is on March 3rd...
It may be over, but we can still wear our kimonos, right?
Note: On this day, elaborate dolls are put out on display.
And it is still okay to keep the dolls out.
Yup, right up until Insect Awakening Day!
Come to think of it, some areas keep them out until the 4th... so, we are fine!
Sylphin looks so different in a kimono, does not she?
She is always wearing the same thing...
Indeed, this year was the first time I have worn a kimono!
The three of us wore kimonos at the department store one time, did not we?
Squaring off against Sylphin makes Kirie rather active...
Leaving me out is unfair indeed!
I wish to take a photo as well!
Leaving me out is unfair indeed!
I wish to take a photo as well!
Let us all four of us go take a photo.
We are not going to Nyaon?
We do not have to go to a department store.
We can take a splendid photo at my house!
All your body's numerical values adhere to the golden ratio!
Truly, it is the Divine Proportion!
Do you have some regimen to accentuate your beauty?
I want it, I want it, I want it!
Shall we guide them to that room?
My mother has won the All-Japan Kimono Fitting Championship.
Not unless I... am always the best!
Sylph, your sleeves are not aligned properly.
W-well, I was moving around at school, so...
I am glad they get along.
Ebina's hometown is in Akita, so I bet she cannot go back that much.
Maybe I will have my mom teach me how to put on a kimono too.
Ebina, we have to put a little more force into it.
Indeed, that is my mother's high-speed kimono fitting technique.
Such a tangible feeling of feminine power!
And look, the dolls are still out on display.
Note: Sushi toppings scattered over a bowl of rice.
I would say this calls for a photo.
It is like a book you would see in the store!
No... the big sellers at Mujimuji Ryohin are the ones that are not too hard to make.
Sure enough, I have not got it.
This artwork still is not enough to capture your grace!
The feeling of just wanting to hold you tight!
I-I would like to have you model for me.
Being a model sure is hard, huh?
I will take care of the posing on my end.
Still, I will be thinking about you being there...
Removing all trace of my presence is my special skill!
Is that really a special skill?
Master is right here in front of me, and she is so cute, but I just cannot capture her expressions.
Is this a lack of my own abilities?
Still, I am sure that with more observation, I will...
Yes, I must watch her even more closely!
I did not mean to wake you!
Even if Master Komaru is Umaru's younger sister, that was...!
It is good to see you, Kirie.
I got you a new flavor of potato chips.
But we are about to have dinner, so you cannot eat them today.
Master's biggest smile is when her older brother is here.
I must go home and start drawing immediately!
This says there is a new Western-style restaurant.
How about we have lunch there while we are shopping?
I am just going to... sleep.
This whole spring break, all she is done is sleep.
I can understand that she is sleepy, but still...
she should dress up a little and go have fun with her friends.
That is pretty responsible of you to always do the shopping yourself.
Apparently, a new restaurant has opened up!
We live in the same complex, so I guess we do a lot of the same things.
it might be the restaurant where my big brother works.
What are you going to do with all those pens?
I want to be a storybook author!
We use them a lot in art class.
Ah, they are for school, huh?
So, Big Brother went off to eat alone, did he?!
How can you go off and eat alone?!
What brings you out with my brother?
W-well, I happened to run into him here...
For me, it was at the supermarket.
Kirie, are you buying those pens?
Kirie, I bet you could totally be a storybook author...!
I-it may be spring break, but we use them a lot in art class, do not we?
There is something Kirie does not want us to know.
Ebina saw that and has been trying to cover for her.
She is not talking to Umaru and Kirie about her big brother either...
Maybe she thinks she has to be careful and not talk about these things.
You are really kind, are not you?
It is great, is not it, Ebina?
I want to turn the A/C on!
I want to turn the A/C on!
It is still only May, so it is too soon.
I was so hot last night that I could not sleep!
And here, this is what YOU looked like!
Let us turn it on early this year!
It will not cost that much if we keep it up a little high.
It is not like I am trying to say we are broke.
If you keep the A/C on all the time,
you will stop being able to regulate your body heat and you will get cooling disorder.
That is how Big Brother sees me?
In any case, we are not turning on the A/C till July!
He is turned into some stubborn old man.
Still, stubborn old men are known for having a soft spot for kids...
You sure do know a lot, Big Brother.
I would never heard of cooling disorder!
No, I just saw it on the news.
You have SO much knowledge to draw from that I am jealous!
Why is she acting like some young performer?
And you are always helping me with my studies.
It is such a big help!
I said no, and that means NO!
Big Brother, you are such a scrooge!
Bomba gave it to me last year.
Why did not you bring it out sooner?
It was in the closet and I completely forgot about it.
We will get a nice breeze if we put it by the window.
It is a lot cooler than you would think, huh?
Tonight, I can sleep in comfort!
Big Brother, what are you doing?
Are shooting stars going to shoot?
I do not think we will be seeing any meteor showers this time of year.
There, you see those five stars in a staggered pattern?
You know what that glowing one there is?
And next to that is Deneb.
Have not I taught you like this before?
Umaru, do you know any other stars?
Your dream is so wonderful, Kirie!
I am not worthy of such words, Master!
You should let other people know about it!
One day, I would like to ask your older sister about it.
